reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Single fund for technical assistance and visibility of the cooperation program

description.narrative: L’intervento è diretto ad assicurare l’adeguato supporto e assistenza tecnica alla Sede Estera di La Paz nell’ambito della formulazione, gestione, implementazione e supervisione delle iniziative in corso e in fase di attivazione nei Paesi di competenza (Bolivia, Ecuador e Peru’), allo scopo di incrementare l’efficacia, l’efficienza e la qualita’ degli interventi e promuovere l’opportuna visibilita’ del programma di cooperazione finanziato dall’Italia nella Regione Andina.

The initiative aims to ensure adequate support and technical assistance to the La Paz Foreign Office in the formulation, management, implementation and supervision of the initiatives underway and being activated in the countries of competence (Bolivia, Ecuador and Peru '), in order to increase the effectiveness, efficiency and quality of the interventions and promote the appropriate visibility of the cooperation program financed by Italy in the Andean Region.

tag.narrative: Enhance international support for implementing effective and targeted capacity-building in developing countries to support national plans to implement all the Sustainable Development Goals, including through North-South, South-South and triangular cooperation
